title: Auto-Launching Applications at Okta Login
content:
Would you like to automagically have all of your key applications populate in browser tabs when you login to Okta for the day? You can save tile clicks by following these steps… Instructions For any application you’d like to auto-open, begin by selecting the ... on the tile’s upper, right-hand corner. In the right-hand sidebar that opens, select Edit . Then, check the box for Auto-launch this app when I sign in. Click Save. Continue the steps above for each application you’d like to have auto-launch. Demonstration of Instructions [Image]

Page Labels: dws-user, virtual_agent
